nodes.documentation:
@dev We allow an account to authorize 1 other account to sign document on their behalf. Think of it like Power of Attorney etc.
@param _delegate The address of the account that you authorize full signing power for you.
nodes.name: authorize

nodes.documentation: @dev Remove a previous delegate one have previous assigned. Note here we allow this method to be fired even when the contract is not paused as users should be able to retract in all circumstances.
nodes.name: deauthorize
getDelegate
isDelegate
